I am in Ecuador to participate in #CumbreCelacEC, which brings together 33 countries from Latin America and the Caribbean, and to meet with PR @MashiRafael
In March, we will hold in Brasilia the 2nd meeting of the Trade Monitoring Commission #BrasilEquador
I proposed to PR @MashiRafael Investment Cooperation and Facilitation Agreement (ACFI) with Ecuador #BrasilEquador
Brazil and Ecuador have strengthened cooperation in combating trafficking in persons. Decreased irregular migratory flow with Acre ticket
The Manta-Manaus axis, which will connect the Ecuadorian Pacific to the Brazilian Amazon and the Atlantic, is an important project of our bilateral agenda
At #CumbreCelacEC we discuss themes for the well-being of our populations. We need to join efforts to find answers to common challenges
We have to wage war against Aedes Aegypt, vector of Dengue, Chikungunya and Zika. WHO warned that our entire region is under threat
While we do not have a vaccine against the Zika virus, the war should focus on the extermination of mosquito breeding sites #ForaZika #ZikaZero
Ending Zika is the responsibility of all of us and each one #ForaZika #ZikaZero
We need to eliminate all outbreaks of still water, where Aedes lives and reproduces #ForaZika #ZikaZero
The ministers of Health of Mercosur will meet next week #ForaZika #ZikaZero
CELAC should help bring our regional integration in addition to tariff reduction and include, for example, services and investments
Brazil has much to share with #Celac countries in their experience of social inclusion that took 36 million Brazilians out of poverty
We want to learn from successful practices in the countries of the region. #Celac is the forum for advancing this dialogue
